MAN.TITLE: drawlater

PARAM_DESCRIPTION.SP: : a handle or a list of handles of type axes.

DESCRIPTION.P: This function can be used to not display on the screen all graphics objects called by its basic drawing commands. The Visibility property of the current axes (no argument specified), or the axes entity (represented by the handle h) or the current figure ('all') is set to "off" . Therefore, all children of these axes or figure will not be displayed too.
It can specially be used with the drawnow function.

-drawnow() to display the current axes. Warning : note that between drawlater and drawnow calls, the current figure and/or current axes may have changed. Therefore, the use of drawlater/drawnow commands without argument must be used carefully.
-drawnow(h) to display the axes reprensented by the handle h.
-drawnow('all') to display the current figure. Warning : note that between drawlater and drawnow calls, the current figure may have changed. Therefore, this must be used carefully.
